bibl.title: Ancient Papyri and Our New Testament.
bibl.note: After a sketch of the manuscript tradition of the NT, special discussion follows of Sanders' Epistles of Paul, and, briefly, of Roberts' Unpublished Fragment of the Fourth Gospel.

bibl.title: Thought. A Quarterly of the Sciences and Letters

bibl.seg: McGarry W.J., Ancient Papyri and Our New Testament.
Thought. A Quarterly of the Sciences and Letters 11 (1936) pp. 273-285.
After a sketch of the manuscript tradition of the NT, special discussion follows of Sanders' Epistles of Paul, and, briefly, of Roberts' Unpublished Fragment of the Fourth Gospel.
